name: Plum-and-Grapefruit Salsa
keywords: grapefruit, jalapeño, plum, nut-free, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 8 plums, halved, pitted and thinly sliced
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Using a knife, remove the peel and pith from the grapefruit and discard. Cut the sections out from between the membranes and cut each section in half lengthwise.
Transfer to a medium bowl and add the plums, jalapeno, ginger, cilantro and mint. Toss and season with salt and pepper.
Let sit at room temperature for at least half an hour and up to 1 hour. Serve with grilled chicken, seafood or tortilla chips. (Can be covered and refrigerated for one day.)
